attributes.action: Britain should disassociate itself from the current the human rights act
attributes.additional_details: Britain should disassociate itself from the current the human rights act , and form a new act to be called "British human rights act " the contents of which to be decided upon by the British government solely in the interests of the British people , so that British values can decide what it is reasonable that an individual can demand from society and what society as whole can expect in return,
